name: Shark Riders
description:
Shark Riders

Game 1 of 12 in a weekly game challenge

I didn't make a loading screen so if you see a blank green screen, be patient it's loading. Next game will have a progress bar and hopefully less bugs!

You are a shark rider and need to devour all the swimmers of the ocean. Try and eat the most swimmers but beware of the fisherman on the boats trying to hunt you down.

Change directions with the Left/Right arrow keys and jump with the Up arrow.
